adverbs.description: shortsightedly (comparative more shortsightedly, superlative most shortsightedly)

examples: The teacher peered shortsightedly around the classroom.

entries.meaning: In a manner that fails to consider the big picture or future effects of an action or decision.
examples: He shortsightedly decided not to go to college and instead entered the workforce; so he made more money the first few years, but his earning power was never as great as it could have been.
